record.field: G22: Estimated net GST for the year
G23: Varied GST amount for the quarter
G24: Reason code for GST variation
F1: Tax Office FBT instalment amount
F2: Estimated FBT for the year
F3: Varied FBT amount for the quarter
F4: Reason code for FBT variation
PAYG income tax instalment reporting option
T4: Reason code for PAYG income tax instalment variation
T5/ T7: Tax Office PAYG income tax instalment amount
T11 = T1 x T2 (or T1 x T3)
T8: Estimated PAYG income tax for the year
T6/T9: Varied PAYG income tax instalment amount
T3: Business Variation - New varied rate
5B: Credit from PAYG income tax instalment variation
